title: After the Fight
description: (Warning: This story contains content some readers may find offensive or disturbing.)Mason, a crass brute with a history of violent relationships sits in the home of his old school-friend, Dominic. The boxing over, they are finishing their drinking. Dominic's wife, Jennifer, has retired to the bedroom to keep out of the way - she cannot stand Mason. When Dominic has to leave unexpectedly, things take an unpleasant turn.(Noncon erotic short story)You can get it here: https://www.smashwords.com/books/view...
author: Malthus Blake
